This game use to be good but now it's fffuckinggg shittt because people vote to kick you for no reason or if your AFK for 2 seconds. And then the game keeps trying to join you to the same server you got kicked from. And then when you eventually find another server it's full of fking hackers. 

Fix your fking anti cheat and get rid of the vote kick.
